text: This is phenomenal, what a great tribute to dub music. King Tubby would be proud.
author: DawnofMeat

text: I've been looping this one for quite a while now, I love how mellow it is, the bass, everything. I uploaded the Opening theme a long while back, which is still one of the weirdest ones i've heard (and for me, in an awesome way). It's a crime this great game wasn't released here because Nintendo deemed it too strange for western audiences. Gifptia is a very unique adventure game made by Skip (known for Chibi-Robo), which is a small company that formed after Love-de-Lic disbanded. Love-de-Lic was mostly known for another great japanese exclusive game, Moon Remix RPG Adventure (which has been featured in this list) and you can definitely see similarities in style and music between both games, with Kenichi Nishi being the designer. Interestingly enough, Miyamoto was one of this game's producers.
author: SupraDarky

text: +SupraDarky They deemed it too strange, yet give us Earthbound.  DAMMIT, NINTENDO!
author: BygPhattyPlus

text: +SupraDarky it's such a shame that none of love-de-lic's games were released here. they have made some of the best games of all time and skip and vanpool's games were just as good.love-de-lic has made such an impact on gaming, it's a shame we can't play their games
author: lucas smith

text: +SupraDarky What a strange game! I like the premise - go around doing good for others. But man, that debt to work off is pretty onerous - shows what you get for oversleeping!
